text: Wang Li (born 4 December 1962) is a Chinese former cyclist. She competed in the women's road race event at the 1984 Summer Olympics and 1986 Asian Games. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Chinese female cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of China Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in cycling Category:Cyclists at the 1986 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 1986 Asian Games Category:Asian Games silver medalists for China
title: Wang Li (cyclist)
